website_summaries.verdict: A good men's watch from Timex for individuals who enjoy adventuring outdoors.
pros: Tough, durable exterior construction can withstand drops, scratches, and impacts likely encountered while hiking or camping
cons: Analog hands in the watch dial click louder than other similar watches available

customer_reviews.title: Great camp watch
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a camping watch that was analog, water resistant and most important able to read at night, this ticked all the boxes it looks good without the bulk of other similar watches, this has a better light( Indaglo can't be beat) 22mm strap as oppose to the 16mm or 20mm, and 100m water resistant compared to other that have 50m or 30m. only thing that would have made it the perfect watch was if the bezel turned, it does not, I hate fake bezels but for the price and compared to everything else its the best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have not owned a Timex for 25 years,however I ordered this after my Casio g shock failed. I have owned several Casio watches and love this watch better then any of the Gshocks that I have had.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy O.

customer_reviews.title: They are tough, waterproof, accurate and more very reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: I have been a Timex Expedition fan for decades. I work outdoors providing landscaping and lawn care services and I am rough on watches. I've stuck with Expeditions for all these years because they are tough, waterproof, accurate and more very reasonably priced. And they look good, too.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, lightweight, nice band with band lock, seems durable but it ticks LOUD. I’m used to digital so perhaps I need an adjustment period. Let’s see if it keeps time before I pass final judgement
customer_reviews.author: gator

customer_reviews.title: One tough watch!
customer_reviews.text: No down side here.I lost my solar Casio analog fishing.This timex is perfect size,perfect fit.I love the dial look and indiglo.just wanted to add that I put watch in a 5 gal bait bucket full of shrimp.I wanted to check water resistance.It handled it like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Nate-man

customer_reviews.title: 15-20 minutes slow soon after arrival...
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, but after a month lost accuracy by 15 to 25 minutes slow... reset to correct time and a week or less later does the same thing... defeats purpose of having a watch don't ya think...
customer_reviews.author: katy c.

customer_reviews.title: (not a*) Good utility watch for location film work.
customer_reviews.text: * Review Update 10/22/19: You get what you pay for; 86'd after I caught the watch on a shelf edge and the winding stem sheared off. Not a violent collision by any stretch of the imagination. Downgrade to 2 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: J Edward Firzgerald

customer_reviews.title: He had an older version which broke and he was so happy to replace it with this
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my husband wanted for work. He had an older version which broke and he was so happy to replace it with this.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Bevilacqua

customer_reviews.title: May have to return.
customer_reviews.text: Like the watch and love the band . Just the watch I need that can take a beating. The problem is it keeps stopping, for some reason the stem keeps coming out just enough to stop the time.
customer_reviews.author: Warren K. Hager

customer_reviews.title: Hard to read in darkness
customer_reviews.text: Hard to read and the backlight or indiglo is not very bright. But it's a good work watch. Keeps the time.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Takes a licking
customer_reviews.text: It's a perfect watch for high intensity workouts and mountain biking. Having a little difficulty changing the date but hopefully will get the hang of that.
customer_reviews.author: Brian V. Rowe

customer_reviews.title: It’s Groundhog Day!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this watch in April. It’s now October. Keeps perfect time. I like the backlight. It comfortable to wear. However, the date no longer works. It usually flips around midnight. No more, every day is the same day.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Wainwright

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: My husband really likes this watch and loves the built in light. Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Traci A. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: overall I love the watch
customer_reviews.text: overall I love the watch. Unfortunately the battery is on its way out . when it arrived the watch was running unlike when watches are usually shipped with the little crown holder preventing the battery from running until it is purchased
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Slow
customer_reviews.text: The watch runs five minutes slow in 12hours then counties getting slower
customer_reviews.author: Daniel McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Protected Stem
customer_reviews.text: Great watch and has protected stem.My other Times Expedition kept breaking the stem off snagging it on something.
customer_reviews.author: Tom T

customer_reviews.title: NICE TIMEX !
customer_reviews.text: GREAT OUTDOORS WATCH , EASY TO SEE . I LIKE THAT THE KNOB IS PROTECTED ! WORKS GREAT AND FEELS GOOD ON !
customer_reviews.author: John P. Janssen

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Watch!
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. It is just a basic analog time piece that also shows the date. Manufactured to be resistant to wear and tear. Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: S. Malone

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Good Quality watch!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice looking watch , very comfortable, Timex expedition watch beats Casio G-shocks watch’s , not only that, also it beats the price!
customer_reviews.author: Irvin Galvan

customer_reviews.title: Broken and bad out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken. Second hand did not function. Super sad. No more Timex brand watches for me.
customer_reviews.author: lycanthrope

customer_reviews.title: Shame on Timex
customer_reviews.text: Watch looks great-feels very light with a really comfortable band. But it has a cheap PLASTIC LENS , totally scratched after wearing it for a week. Normally I get a couple years out of a Timex ,not this watch it going back.
customer_reviews.author: Clark Kroeger

customer_reviews.title: Had defective band post or receptacle
customer_reviews.text: I liked the watch, but had to send it back because the band would not stay on the watch. Either a bad post spring or receptacle. I fixed it three times, but it kept popping out.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R.

customer_reviews.title: Below expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Came packaged well however it keeps time accurately but the date indicator does advance at all and the light only works speractly when you push the button. Not the quality I have been a custom to from Timex.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch. Good price,works great, and the background light is perfecl.
customer_reviews.author: sher

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: It’s all good, ad said had alarm but it doesn’t!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Fits good. I'm a Timex guy
customer_reviews.text: Fits good. I'm a Timex guy. Last watch lasted 8 years. Going to miss the weight of my stainless steel band.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The watch that was shipped did not work & it was returned for a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Kuenzle

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It''s a great looking watch and the watch band is almost clamped to my wrist. But it arrived with the retaining guard partially broken and the watch was running. When I discovered that the Indiglo feature wasn't working, I found a piece of the guard was stuck on the underside of the crown. Indiglo works now and it keeps time, but the date does not advance automatically. I have to advance it each morning.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not water resistant at all.
customer_reviews.text: This watch died the first time any water was splashed on it. The watch was not submerged - just splashed - and quit working right away. The watch is very attractive and looks good on the wrist, though.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie B

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The watch does not keep time worked for a day then always runs 10min slow
customer_reviews.author: bob Price

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the indiglo light stopped working after 2 months I have to return it to timex now. hassel.
customer_reviews.author: Wayde Y.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money, doesn't keep correct date or time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Timex Men's TW4B01000 Expedition Field Shock Black Resin Strap Watch
product_meta.description:
Drop it, bang it, submerge it... We’ve made shock watches since 1950 so you don’t have to worry. This hardened resin case is officially shock resistant to standard international benchmarks and water resistant to 100 meters.

Drop it, bang it, submerge it... whether you're inside or on the trail. The hardened resin case is officially shock resistant to standard international benchmarks and water resistant to 100 meters.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :2.5 x 3 x 3.5 inches; 1.8 Ounces
 * Item model number :TW4B01000
 * Department :Mens
 * Batteries :1 Lithium Metal batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :February 11, 2015
 * Manufacturer :Timex Corporation
 * ASIN :B00PUE3P6M

Drop it, bang it, submerge it... whether you're inside or on the trail. The hardened resin case is officially shock resistant to standard international benchmarks and water resistant to 100 meters.
feature_bullets: Water resistant to 100m (330ft): in general, suitable for swimming and snorkeling, but not diving
